function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"COVID-19 transmission in crowded urban areas","Impact":"Increased risk of virus transmission and spread","Mitigation":"Implementing physical distancing measures and ventilation systems in urban areas","Technologies":"Air purifiers, HVAC systems with HEPA filters","People":"Urban residents, visitors, essential workers","Owner":"Local government, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Limited access to outdoor public spaces","Impact":"Negative impact on physical and mental health of urban residents","Mitigation":"Promoting outdoor activities with safety measures, expanding outdoor spaces","Technologies":"Online reservation systems for park access, smart city technology for monitoring crowd density","People":"Urban residents, local community organizations","Owner":"Local government, park management authorities"},{"Description":"Social isolation and mental health impact","Impact":"Increased risk of depression, anxiety, and social disconnection","Mitigation":"Promoting safe social interactions, mental health support services","Technologies":"Telehealth platforms, virtual community events","People":"Urban residents, vulnerable populations, mental health professionals","Owner":"Local government, healthcare organizations"}]}
